```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(dbplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
conn <- src_memdb() #Create a SQLite database from memory 
sqlite <- conn$con #taking the SQLite object contained within the conn object in memory 
copy_to(conn, iris, overwrite = T) #copies the built-in iris data-set to the memory object 
```

```{sql connection  = sqlite}
select * from iris limit 5
```


```{sql connection  = sqlite}
select * from iris where (Species) = 'setosa' ; 

```
